sentences.sContent: He will be inaugurated (as) President in January.
sentences.sCn: 他将于一月份就任总统。

sentences.sContent: The moon landing inaugurated a new era in space exploration.
sentences.sCn: 登陆月球开创了太空探索的新纪元。

synos.tran: 创新；开辟；开创；举行开幕典礼；举行就职典礼

remMethod.val: in(进入) ＋ aug(使产生) ＋ urate → 开始， 开展

words.tran: 开始的；开幕的；就任的，就职的
就职典礼；开始，开创；开幕式

trans.tranOther: to introduce a new public official or leader at a special ceremony
